turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Disturbing the Peace (album).
turn.2: Disturbing the Peace (album) Disturbing the Peace is the second studio album by the American heavy metal band Alcatrazz, and is the only one featuring Steve Vai on guitar.
turn.4: The album remained for 7 weeks on the "Billboard" 200 albums chart, peaking at No. 145.
turn.5: Did they release any other albums?
turn.6: The album was re-released in 2001 as Vol.02 of Steve Vai's "The Secret Jewel Box" and as a remastered, expanded version with a different cover in 2013 on Polish label Metal Mind.
turn.7: What other information is there about this album?
turn.8: All songs by Graham Bonnet and Steve Vai, except where noted.
turn.10: Recorded October 10, 1984, at Shinjuku Koseinenkin Kaikan, Tokyo, Japan
